data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
When I first started coding, I couldn't do a lot of things because
    I had to learn how to use a different module for each of them...
    also, some basic things were challenging (learning how to use
    sprintf for decimal-hex conversion). Inspired by a friend who's
    learning perl, I wrote these functions to let people accomplish more
    while still learning the language.i
